create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_EFTDECLINEBATCHPROCESSPARAMETERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, --@CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @BATCHNUMBER nvarchar(50) = '', @BATCHTYPE tinyint = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_EFTDECLINEBATCH_BUSINESSPROCESS (ID, NAME, BATCHNUMBER, BATCHTYPE, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, 'EFT DECLINE BATCH', @BATCHNUMBER, @BATCHTYPE, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
